Jordan Why Not? Zer0.4 PF.desc:
STAY GROUNDED, FLY FAST.


Speed is Russell Westbrook's not-so-secret weapon. He continually out-hustles the competition, building momentum and muscling his way onto the highlight reel. Cue the Jordan Why Not? Zer0.4, the first to feature double-stacked Zoom in the forefoot. It's an extra-responsive cushioning system that's designed to help him transform speed into force and focus his attack.


Double-Stacked Attack

2 stacked Air Zoom units in the forefoot deliver the ultimate responsiveness and cushioning. They help optimise the energy return you get out of every step.


Locked-In Lacing

The laces combine with strips of webbing in the heel and forefoot. When you tighten the laces, the material engages to help you stay harnessed over the cushioning.


Durable Traction

The extra-durable rubber outsole is designed to play on outdoor courts. It's got a new, data-informed tread pattern that's designed to help keep you low to the ground and ready to react to the game's changing tempo.


More Benefits

  • The outsole is split into sections to help reduce weight by using less rubber underfoot.
  • The extra-durable outsole rubber is designed for play on concrete outdoor courts.
  • Colour Shown: White/Hyper Pink/Lime Glow/Citron Pulse
  • Style: CQ4231-102
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Kyrie Flytrap 4 EP.desc:
PLAY ON THE EDGE.


Play quick on your edges in the Kyrie Flytrap 4, a shoe that's lightweight, supportive and easy to move in. The newest addition to Kyrie's on-court arsenal, his 4th Flytrap has updated grip and responsiveness. A large Zoom Air unit returns more energy than the previous model for cushioning on the court. An internal forefoot band helps stabilise you over the footbed as you move in and out of cuts. This EP version uses an extra-durable outsole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Give Energy, Get Energy

A large, rectangular Zoom Air unit under the ball of your foot provides a responsive feel with every step.


Designed For Quick Cuts

Rubber wraps up the sides at the front, giving you traction on your edges.


Comfort During Possession

A padded, moulded collar provides support for your Achilles tendon.


Secure Your Fit

An interior band combines with the laces to lock you in.


Product Details

  • "KI" on tongue and outsole
  • Wavy, distorted outsole pattern
  • Extra-durable rubber outsole
  • Colour Shown: Black/White/Gum Light Brown/Metallic Cool Grey
  • Style: CT1973-006
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

LeBron 18.desc:
THE EVOLUTION OF FORCE.


When LeBron accelerates down the court, he produces tremendous force.The LeBron 18 is designed to harness his abilities while helping with the stress he puts on his body.Combined cushioning underfoot allows him to use his power for unstoppable bursts of speed.


Power On the Court

Max Air provides impact cushioning under the heel.A moulded TPU heel counter helps stabilise the foot while you generate force on the court.


Generate Speed

A full-length Zoom Air unit is nestled within the Max Air under the heel and extends into the forefoot.The high-volume unit helps provide energy return that's fine-tuned for speed.


Lace Up, Lock In

Knitposite 2.0 is lightweight and breathable, with knit-in stretch for a secure fit.Laces feed through tunnels engineered into the knit, helping anchor you down without extra weight.


Tongue Comfort

3 pods embedded in each tongue provide comfort over the top of your foot.


Grid Traction

The grid-like pattern on the outsole provides grippy traction in multiple directions.The diamond-shaped cut-outs help reduce weight and expose the cushioning inside.


More Benefits

  • "From the city of Akron, Ohio" moulded into left midsole, "Established Nineteen Eighty Four" in the right midsole.
  • Moulded, padded collar fits snugly around the ankle.
  • Colour Shown: Blue Tint
  • Style: CQ9283-401
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Zion 1 PF.desc:
MADE TO MOVE DIFFERENTLY.


With a down-to-earth persona and abilities that are out of this world, Zion is unlike anybody else.On court, the gentle spirit who's all about family transforms into an unmatched force of unstoppable athleticism and speed.The Zion 1 kicks off his signature line with a design inspired by his duality of humility and superhuman ability.Full-length Air Strobel cushioning is stacked with a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot—a sensational mix of plush underfoot comfort and rapid responsiveness.It's light, stable and strong, with aggressive traction to help Zion grip the court and control his power.This PF version uses an extra-durable outsole that's designed for outdoor courts.


Full-Length, Responsive Air

A full-length Air Strobel unit is stitched directly to the upper, sitting right under your foot for a cloud-like feel.An energy-returning Zoom Air unit is stacked underneath the forefoot to add an extra burst of responsiveness.


Locked-In to Step Out

A 2-loop band helps keep you secure each time you lace up, while higher sidewalls provide the utmost side-to-side stability.


A Different Type of Speed

A multi-directional outsole pattern provides stop-and-go traction for players who stay on their toes.


Plush Comfort Without the Weight

A dynamic, flexible tongue includes targeted padding over the top to ease lace pressure and to provide plush comfort without added weight.


More Benefits

  • Durable outsole is designed to play on outdoor courts.
  • Colour Shown: Black/White/Bright Crimson
  • Style: DA3129-006
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Jordan One Take II PF.desc:
DISRUPTIVE SPEED AT THE CRITICAL MOMENT.


Russell Westbrook backs up his brashness with a fast, aggressive playing style and numbers that place him among the league's best. His all-new Jordan One Take II embodies his edginess and speed.Colours, textures and design lines speak to Russ' persona both on and off the court.This PF version uses an extra-durable outsole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Top-Loaded Zoom

The Zoom Air unit in the forefoot is top-loaded to help bring the responsive sensation closer to your foot.The section of the outsole directly under the Zoom switches to herringbone traction.


Ground Control

The rubber outsole is separated into 2 sections to help reduce the shoe's overall weight and enable smooth transitions.A multi-directional cross-hatch tread pattern provides traction to help you stop, cut and go at the game's pace.


Lock-In Lacing

The laces feed through eyestays and webbing loops.When you lace up, it puts tension on the webbing, which helps keep your foot secure over the footbed.


More Benefits

  • Extra-durable rubber outsole is designed to hold up on outdoor surfaces.

Product Details

  • Lightweight, mixed-material upper
  • Breathable mesh tongue
  • Padded collar
  • Exterior plastic shank
  • Colour-shifting tongue logo
  • Heel pull made from lace material
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
  • Colour Shown: White/Lime Glow/Citron Pulse/Hyper Pink
  • Style: CW2458-163
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Giannis Immortality.desc:
UNLEASH YOUR INNER FREAK WITH SPEED, POWER AND CONTROL.


The future of basketball is positionless, and nobody embodies this evolution like MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo.The Giannis Immortality is a game shoe for players who love Giannis's multi-dimensional game and want a piece of his freaky style.


Curved Cushioning For Smooth Strides

The bottom of the shoe is curved from heel to toe for smooth strides.Cut-outs in the foam help reduce weight and provide optimal responsiveness (because there is more space for the foam to compress and expand).


Euro-Step Control

The outsole rubber is partially split by grooves and wraps up the inner side near the front.This allows the rubber to flex and maintain traction when making side-to-side Euro-step moves.


Lightweight Containment

The upper uses an engineered mesh that's lightweight and breathable.An internal strap wraps over the midfoot to help keep you stable when moving from side to side.


Plush Look and Feel

The back section of the upper looks and feels plush.It creates a secure and comfortable harness for the back of your foot to help you perform your best during games.


More Benefits

  • The shape of the sole at the heel is designed for optimal cushioning every time your heel strikes the court.
  • The names of his mum, dad, brothers and son, Liam, are on the outsole.
  • Colour Shown: Black/White/Wolf Grey/Clear
  • Style: CZ4099-010
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

PG 5 EP.desc:
SMOOTH AND STEADY.


Paul George has an effortlessly smooth, reliably steady game.He takes his time, but he's always well-positioned to make the extra pass, cut through the lane or nail a pull-up jumper.The PG 5 EP combines the agile low-top profile Paul likes with flexible Nike Air Dot Weld Strobel cushioning.The full-length Air unit is stitched directly to the upper, bringing the plush, bouncy cushioning right up under the foot—perfect for keeping PG feeling like he's moving on clouds.This EP version uses an extra-durable outsole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Close-Up, Flexible Cushioning

Lightweight, full-length Nike Air Dot Weld Strobel gives PG the cushioning and comfort he needs to thrive during a long season.All-over flexibility helps him transition smoothly between both ends of the court.


Snug Comfort

The laces feed through bands along the side of the foot.Pulling the laces tight pulls the bands inwards so they wrap over the foot to help keep it locked in and stable over the footbed.


Stop-and-Go Control

The outsole has a multi-directional tread pattern to provide stop-and-go traction and control on the court.

Zoom Freak 2.desc:
CONTAIN THE FREAK.


Giannis possesses a freakish combination of height, length and speed rarely seen in the league. The Zoom Freak 2 harnesses his power and enables him to generate force to help drive him down the court. A moulded overlay caps the outer toe area to help contain Giannis's devastating Euro step move.


A New Breed of Speed and Power

Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot and soft, responsive foam help you harness your power to speed down the court.


Stable Euro Steps

A moulded TPU piece on the outer front is designed for one of Giannis's most effective moves. It helps contain and stabilise the foot through the Euro step motion.


Lightweight and Flexible

The outsole rubber is separated into 2 areas with a rigid, supportive piece in between. This helps reduce weight and improves flexibility.


More Benefits

  • The names of Giannis and his 4 brothers (Alex, Francis, Thanasis and Kostas) are moulded into the outsole.
  • Rubberised heel clip helps you pull on the shoe.

Product Details

  • "Freak" engraved in the midsole foam
  • "Freak" Swoosh design on the tongue
  • Traditional tongue and lace construction
  • Asymmetrical lace feeds
  • Reinforced toe
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
  • Colour Shown: Midnight Navy/Fire Pink/White/Poison Green
  • Style: DB4689-400
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Kyrie 7 EP.desc:
CREATE ON DEMAND.


Kyrie Irving is a creative force on and off the court.He needs his shoes to keep up with his playmaking, but also sync with his boundary-pushing style and ethos.The Kyrie 7 helps players at all levels take advantage of their quick first step by optimising the shoe's fit, court feel and banking ability.


Play Contained

Mesh details wrap around your foot to create a close, comfortable fit.The laces feed through moulded fins that pull down over your forefoot when you lace up.


Quick First Step

The large forefoot Air Zoom Turbo unit is curved to bend in multiple directions.It provides energy return for responsive cornering.


Data-Informed Traction

The 360-degree, computer-generated traction pattern helps you stay in control and move in and out of cuts.The rubber wraps up along the inner foot to give you traction when changing directions.


More Benefits

  • Padded collar provides support for your Achilles tendon.
  • Durable outsole rubber is designed for outdoor courts.

Product Details

  • Thin, padded tongue
  • Moulded 'KI' logo on tongue
  • Embroidered graphics on the heel
  • Colour Shown: Black/Arctic Punch/Opti Yellow/Black
  • Style: CQ9327-005
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

PG 5 PS EP.desc:
SMOOTH AND STEADY.


Paul George has an effortlessly smooth, reliably steady game. He takes his time, but he's always well positioned to make the extra pass, cut through the lane or nail a pull-up jumper. A lighter-weight evolution of the 4, the PG 5 combines the agile low-top profile that Paul likes with flexible cushioning. Each part helps keep him riding on comfort while he eases into his next devastating move.


Plush, Flexible Cushioning

Lightweight, full-length Nike Air cushioning gives PG the comfort he needs to thrive during a long season. It's flexible in all directions, helping him transition between each end of the court.


Snug Comfort

The laces feed through bands along the side of the foot. When you pull the laces tight, it pulls the bands inwards, so they wrap over your foot to keep you locked in and stable over the footbed.


Stop-and-Go Control

Similar to the 4, the outsole pattern features a variety of circles to help you grip the court in all directions.

Nike Air Zoom G.T.Run.desc:
INTENSE ENERGY RETURN TO GO ALL GAME.


Feel fresh.Hustle hard.The Nike Air Zoom G.T.Run is designed for players who can do it all on court and need their shoes to keep up.Its cushioning system is stacked with 2 Zoom Air units plus 2 layers of Nike React foam.Ultralight and extra supportive in key areas, it provides a snug, consistent fit and a responsive feel to help you get the most out of your energy and outlast the competition.


Multi-layered Cushioning to Move with Momentum

Right under your foot is a React foam sockliner, and below that a Zoom Air unit that covers most of the forefoot.Both are stacked over a full-length React foam footbed and another forefoot Zoom Air unit.Altogether, they deliver incredible energy return to help you go all game long.


Containment Through Comfort

The 2-layer upper is made from lightweight material that's got haptic print details for durability.It's breathable with a broken-in feel.


Multi-directional Micro-Grip

The thin rubber outsole has curvy ridges that bend and flex to provide traction in multiple directions.The rubber is cut away under the arch and perforated to help reduce weight.


More Benefits

  • The visible midsole is lightweight, durable Nike React foam.
  • The foam tongue moulds to your foot to help provide comfort from lace pressure.
  • A padded, mid-high collar provides comfort and support around the ankle without sacrificing agility.

Product Details

  • Heel pull tab
  • TPU midsole insert
  • Colour Shown: Black/Hyper Crimson/Vapour Green/Ghost
  • Style: CZ0202-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Greater Than Series: Creating the Next Era of Basketball

The future of basketball is positionless, faster and more efficient.Players have to cut quicker, run faster and jump higher than ever to create the separation they'll need to compete at a high level.By precisely engineering the fit, ride and traction, Nike Basketball's Greater Than series aims to deliver measurable benefits to athletes who use their quickness, speed or vertical ability to gain an edge and go beyond what's thought possible.

KD Trey 5 IX EP.desc:
GO ALL IN ON EVERY PLAY LIKE KD.


Kevin Durant is on the court every day, going hard and getting better. The KD Trey 5 IX is built to keep up with his furious work ethic. It gives him the sensation of cloud-like cushioning and broken-in comfort, so he stays fresh and focused. This EP version uses an extra-durable sole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Smooth Energy Return

Nike Renew technology combines a soft inner core of foam surrounded by a firmer foam for springy and resilient cushioning. A Zoom Air unit absorbs force and returns energy with every step.


Lightweight Mesh

Lightweight, layered mesh in the upper gives a secure, supportive fit. It's designed with structure and reinforcement where they're needed most.


Sound-Wave Traction

The rubber sole with a sound wave-inspired traction pattern helps you grip the court in multiple directions. The pattern is a nod to KD's love of music.


More Benefits

  • The extra-durable sole is designed for outdoor courts.

Product Details

  • Circular outsole cut-out
  • Embroidered heel logo
  • Plush, padded collar
  • Debossed KD logo on tongue top
  • No-sew overlays
  • Embossed disc detail on side heel
  • Textured outline Swoosh design
  • Colour Shown: Black/White/Gum Light Brown/Metallic Cool Grey
  • Style: CW3402-006
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Nike Precision 5.desc:
GET INTO THE GAME AND CUT WITH CONFIDENCE.


A quick first step makes all the difference. The Nike Precision 5 locks in your foot with structured materials and cushions with resilient foam. Stripped down and sculpted, the shape allows quick cuts and hard banks when you're angling for an advantage.


Lightweight Structure

Lightweight materials are reinforced with no-sew overlays and embroidered details. This helps provide durability and added structure where you need it most.


Sculpted For Speed

A sculpted foam midsole combines soft cushioning with a fast look.


Basketball Traction

The rubber outsole uses herringbone traction to help you change directions.


Less is More

Less foam and less rubber compared to previous versions helps reduce weight.


More Benefits

  • Low collar allows ankle mobility.

Product Details

  • Nike label on tongue top
  • No-sew overlays and embroidered detail
  • Synthetic Swoosh design details
  • Colour Shown: Anthracite/Gym Red/Black/Metallic Dark Grey
  • Style: CW3403-007
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Nike Cosmic Unity (Team).desc:
MORE PERFORMANCE. LESS IMPACT.


The Nike Cosmic Unity (Team) is trash that helps keep you fresh, giving you back the energy you need to let your game do the talking when it counts. We built a sleek and comfortable silhouette with sustainability in mind. It's made from at least 25% recycled material by weight and comes equipped with a partially recycled Air Zoom Strobel designed to help you be efficient off the dribble or effective on defence. This is trash, transformed into a tool for basketball players to get a little more out of their game, while taking a little less from the planet.


More Trash. Fresh Game.

A sleek design, made from at least 25% recycled material by weight, features a full-length Air Zoom Strobel unit, which provides the energy return to help you feel fresh all game long.


Built for Efficiency

This shoe is light, durable and made from partially recycled materials in the upper, midsole, lace system and outsole. It's built to contain your every move, from smooth turnaround jumpers to slick lay-ups off the glass.


From the Floor to the Finish

A thin, durable outsole helps provide the on-court traction you need to take defenders off the dribble and change direction at will.

LeBron Witness 5.desc:
MASTER YOUR MOMENTUM.


Level up your game in the LeBron Witness 5, a strong, lightweight shoe that's sculpted to look fast. Its rigid heel piece and forefoot lockdown system provides support. Responsive cushioning and multi-directional traction work together to help you stay in control as you drive toward the basket.


Build Momentum

2 Zoom Air units under the ball of your foot provide responsiveness as you run the floor.


Strength and Stability

A rigid heel counter with moulded lion graphic helps contain the back of your foot and keep you stable.


Stay In Control

The rubber outsole with multi-directional traction helps you stay in control.


Product Details

  • Lightweight, breathable mesh
  • Resilient foam midsole
  • Tongue and lace construction
  • Colour Shown: Cool Grey/Black/White
  • Style: CQ9380-007
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Nike Air Max Impact 2.desc:
A BOARD-CRASHING, POST-UP PLAYMAKER.


Play with fearlessness in the Nike Air Max Impact 2. Built for powerful players who like a lot of cushioning, it features a large Air-Sole unit that's placed beneath a moulded heel piece. Wide straps extend from the heel to keep your foot anchored to the footbed and you focused on your game.


Game-Tested Cushioning

Exposed Max Air cushioning under the heel helps provide responsiveness on the court.


Moulded Support

The moulded heel clip is inspired by the Air Max 270. Updated from last year's model, it feels light and helps keep your foot locked in and stable.


Anchored Heel

Wide straps run from under the heel piece on both sides to anchor you down when you lace up.


Product Details

  • Lightweight mesh material in the upper with reinforced toe
  • Rubber outsole with herringbone traction
  • Rubber wraps up forefoot for durability
  • Foam midsole
  • Colour Shown: Anthracite/Metallic Dark Grey/Gym Red/Black
  • Style: CQ9382-004
  • Country/Region of Origin: India

Nike Air Zoom G.T.Cut.desc:
CREATE YOUR SPACE.CHANGE THE GAME.


The Nike Air Zoom G.T.Cut is made for the Space Makers—the players who use their skills to create space for themselves and others.This lightweight, low-to-the-ground silhouette is built to minimise ground contact, giving you a sense of total control and lateral stability.It also comes equipped with a full React drop-in sole stacked on top of a parabolic Air Zoom Strobel and an Air Zoom unit in the heel, providing a snappy, responsive feel.


Respond and React

A full React drop-in sole paired with a parabolic Air Zoom Strobel cushioning stacked with a Zoom unit in the heel helps provide the responsiveness you need to create space and opportunity off the dribble.


Creative Control

A thin, layered sole is sculpted to provide edge-to-edge traction and help minimise ground contact for a sensation of total control.This shoe is for players who can create space to score on offence or reclaim space with intensity on the defensive end.


Comfortable in Space

A low-to-the-ground design built with reinforced lightweight layered mesh provides containment and optimal lateral stability.It also features a plush interior, making it ideal for players who want to feel quick without sacrificing comfort or control.


More Benefits

  • A stiff clip around the heel helps lock your foot in over the cushioning.
  • React-foam heel wedge adds responsive comfort.

Product Details

  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
  • Colour Shown: White/Bright Crimson/Pink Blast/Black
  • Style: CZ0175-106
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Greater Than Series: Creating the Next Era of Basketball

The future of basketball is positionless, faster and more efficient.Players have to cut quicker, run faster and jump higher than ever to create the separation they'll need to compete at a high level.By precisely engineering the fit, ride and traction, Nike Basketball's Greater Than series aims to deliver measurable benefits to athletes who use their quickness, speed or vertical ability to gain an edge and go beyond what's thought possible.

Kyrie Flytrap 3 EP.desc:
PLAY QUICKER ON YOUR EDGE.


Built for Kyrie Irving's incomparably quick game, the Kyrie Flytrap 3 EP combines full-foot support and containment, responsive cushioning and an aggressive outsole that's contoured for seamless movement through impossibly tight lanes.


Side-to-Side Traction

Curved outsole has a tread pattern that wraps the midsole from side to side, maintaining traction on your edges as you transition through your stride.


Responsive Cushioning

Nike Zoom cushioning provides a springy responsiveness.


Lightweight Support and Containment

Forefoot bands combine with laces to lock you in over the midfoot. A high padded collar provides support around the ankle.


More Benefits

  • Flywire cables combine with forefoot bands to lock you in.
  • Internal heel counter for stability.

Product Details

  • Traditional tongue construction
  • Colour Shown: White/Cool Grey/Black
  • Style: CD0191-103
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

KD14 EP.desc:
FEEL FRESH, PLAY LONG.


Kevin Durant lurks on the wing, waiting for the right time to strike before slicing his way through defences.The KD14 EP is designed to help versatile, relentless players like KD feel fresh all game long.Multi-layer mesh and a midfoot strap help reduce the foot's movements inside the shoe.Full-length Zoom Air cushioning plus Cushlon foam give back energy for lasting performance.This EP version uses an extra-durable sole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Zero-Distraction Fit, Broken-In Feel

Multi-layer mesh in the upper is lightweight and dimensional with a broken-in feel.Added thickness in strategic areas helps to keep your foot in place by reducing small movements.


Strap In

A hook-and-loop strap wraps over the top of the laces for support and a secure fit.It's a subtle nod to the strap of the KD4 and takes inspiration from the shape of the grim reaper's scythe.


Ultimate Responsive Sensation

The full-length Air Zoom Strobel unit is stitched directly to the upper.It helps cut unnecessary weight and provides full-foot responsiveness.Cushlon foam adds a soft, comfortable sensation.


Tuned Traction

Grooves and ridges in the sole help provide multi-directional traction and court feel.A stiff piece under the arch helps keep the shoe stable.Both shoes together reveal the face of a skull.


More Benefits

  • Stiff piece on the outer edge provides midfoot stability.
  • The extra-durable sole is designed to play on outdoor courts.
  • Colour Shown: Black/Copa/Orange Trance/White
  • Style: CZ0170-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Zoom Freak 2 'Play for the Future'.desc:
CONTAIN THE FREAK.


Giannis possesses a freakish combination of height, length and speed rarely seen in the league. The Zoom Freak 2 harnesses his power and helps enable him to generate force to help drive him down the court. A moulded overlay caps the outer toe area to help contain Giannis's devastating Euro step move.


A New Breed of Speed and Power

The combination of Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot and soft, responsive foam helps you harness your power to speed down the court.


Stable Euro Steps

A moulded TPU piece on the outer front is designed for one of Giannis's most effective moves. It helps contain and stabilise the foot through the Euro step motion.


Lightweight and Flexible

The outsole rubber is separated into 2 areas with a rigid, supportive piece in between. This helps reduce weight and improves flexibility.


More Benefits

  • The names of Giannis and his 4 brothers (Alex, Francis, Thanasis and Kostas) are moulded into the outsole.
  • Rubberised heel clip helps you pull on the shoe.

Product Details

  • "Freak" engraved in the midsole foam
  • "Freak" Swoosh design on the tongue
  • Traditional tongue and lace construction
  • Asymmetrical lace feeds
  • Colour Shown: White/Bright Mango/Black
  • Style: CK5424-101
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

PG 4 EP.desc:
HEAD IN THE GAME. FEET IN THE CLOUDS.


Paul George is the rare high-percentage shooter who's also a coach's dream on D. Designed for his unrivalled 2-way game, the PG 4 EP unveils a new cushioning system that's lightweight, articulated and responsive, ideal for players like PG who go hard every play.


Full-Length Air

An ultra-lightweight footbed made from a Nike Air unit that runs the entire length of the shoe, creating a near-instantaneous feeling of responsiveness.


Breathable System

A dual-mesh, semi-transparent zipped overlay fastens over the laces to provide supportive containment and breathability.


Locked-In Comfort

A low-cut collar, full bootie construction and internal webbing system provides an easy entry, plush comfort and secure fit.


More Benefits

  • Circular traction pattern offers multi-directional grip and control.
  • Outsole cut-out lets you see the Air unit.
  • Sockliner adds layer of cushion
  • "Trece" on tip of the left shoe; "Young" on tip of the right shoe
  • "NG 11/01/17" on the right midsole; "OG 05/01/14" on the left midsole
  • Colour Shown: Black/Rush Blue/University Red/Metallic Silver
  • Style: CD5082-006
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

LeBron 18 'Best 10–18'.desc:
THE EVOLUTION OF FORCE.


When LeBron accelerates down the court, he produces tremendous force.The LeBron 18 is designed to harness his abilities while helping with the stress he puts on his body.Combined cushioning underfoot allows him to use his power for unstoppable bursts of speed.This eclectic colourway combines hues from some of the most renowned colourways throughout the history of The King's signature line.


Power On the Court

Max Air cushioning under the heel softens the impact of playing.A stiff moulded heel piece helps stabilise the foot while you generate force on the court.


Generate Speed

A full-length Zoom Air unit is nestled within the Max Air cushioning under the heel and extends into the forefoot.The high-volume unit helps provide energy return that's fine-tuned for speed.


Lace Up, Lock In

Knitposite 2.0 is lightweight and breathable, with knit-in stretch for a secure fit.Laces feed through tunnels engineered into the knit, helping anchor you down without extra weight.


Air Up Top

Pods embedded in the tongue bring a new degree of comfort and cushioning over the top of your foot.


Product Details

  • Moulded, padded collar around the ankle
  • Rubber sole with multi-directional traction pattern
  • Colour Shown: Psychic Purple/Multi-Colour/Black
  • Style: DM2813-500
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

KD Trey 5 VIII EP.desc:
FUEL FOR KD.


Kevin Durant goes all-out every play and needs his shoes to keep up. The KD Trey 5 VIII EP has a supportive, responsive midsole paired with multi-directional traction for use on indoor and outdoor courts. The layered, mid-high upper keeps you feeling light and secure around the ankle.


Play With Bounce

A dual-density midsole features soft, responsive Nike Renew foam surrounded by a firmer foam, providing a nice balance of comfort and stability.


Ankle Support

The mid-high collar is strategically layered with foam to provide comfort and support all around your ankle.


On-Court Control

A rubber outsole with a wavy tread pattern provides durable, multi-directional traction for the game's fast stops and starts. KD's logo is moulded into the rubber.


Product Details

  • Engineered material in the forefoot
  • Padded, breathable tongue with raw foam detail
  • Durable rubber outsole plays on indoor and outdoor courts
  • Colour Shown: White/Black/White
  • Style: CK2089-101
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

LeBron 18 Low 'Neon Nights'.desc:
THE EVOLUTION OF LIGHTWEIGHT SPEED.


The street is the stage for the LeBron Low, a shoe engineered to give LeBron the contained, connected feel he likes but with more ankle mobility.Inspired by the colourful energy of a nighttime city skyline, the LeBron 18 Low 'Neon Nights' shows off a bold combination of Hot Pink and Cool Blue.The low-cut frame is strong yet lightweight, with a smooth, responsive cushioning system that every athlete* can experience on the court and beyond.The release nods to a seasonal Nike Basketball apparel collection that features a matching neon colour scheme.


Impact Cushioning and Responsiveness

A Max Air unit under the heel provides impact cushioning for big, strong players like LeBron.It's paired with full-length Nike React technology for smooth transitions and responsiveness.


Lightweight, Durable Materials

Woven material in the upper is lightweight and durable.Overlays provide structure and support.


Heel Lock-In

The external moulded heel clip provides lightweight support to help lock in the rear of your foot.


Product Details

  • Light, padded tongue
  • No-sew overlays
  • Padded collar
  • Rubber outsole with diamond cut-outs
  • Colour Shown: Fireberry/Light Blue Fury/Pure Platinum/Black
  • Style: CV7562-600
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Nike Cosmic Unity.desc:
INTRODUCING THE COSMIC UNITY.


The Nike Cosmic Unity is trash that helps keep you fresh, giving you back the energy you need to let your game do the talking when it counts. We built a sleek and comfortable silhouette with sustainability in mind. It's made from at least 25% recycled material by weight and comes equipped with a partially recycled Air Zoom Strobel designed to help you be efficient off the dribble or effective on defence. This is trash, transformed into a tool for basketball players to get a little more out of their game, while taking a little less from the planet.


More Trash. Fresh Game.

A sleek design, made from at least 25% recycled material by weight, features a full-length Air Zoom Strobel unit, which provides the energy return to help you feel fresh all game long.


Built for Efficiency

This shoe is light, durable and made from partially recycled materials in the upper, midsole, lace system and outsole. It's built to contain your every move, from smooth turnaround jumpers to slick lay-ups off the glass.


From the Floor to the Finish

A thin, durable outsole, which uses rubber partially made from recycled materials, provides the on-court traction you need to take defenders off the dribble and change direction at will.

Jordan 'Why Not?' Zer0.4 PF.desc:
WHY NOT?


Speed is Russell Westbrook's not-so-secret weapon. He out-hustles the competition, building momentum and muscling his way onto the highlight reel. Cue the Jordan 'Why Not?' Zer0.4, the first to feature double-stacked Zoom in the forefoot. It's an extra-responsive cushioning system that's designed to help him transform speed into force and focus his attack. This PF version uses an extra-durable outsole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Double-Stacked Attack

2 stacked Air Zoom units in the forefoot deliver the ultimate responsiveness and cushioning. They help optimise the energy return you get out of every step.


Locked-In Lacing

The laces combine with strips of webbing in the heel and forefoot. When you tighten the laces, the material engages to help you stay harnessed over the cushioning.


Fast-Action Traction Outdoors

The durable rubber outsole has a new, data-informed tread pattern. It helps keep you low to the ground and ready to react to the game's changing tempo. The rubber is designed to go hard on outdoor courts.

LeBron Witness 5 EP.desc:
MASTER YOUR MOMENTUM.


Level up your game in the LeBron Witness 5, a strong, lightweight shoe that's sculpted to look fast. Its rigid heel piece and forefoot lockdown system provide support. Cushioning and multi-directional traction work together to help you grip the court as you drive towards the basket. This EP version has an extra-durable outsole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Build Momentum

2 Zoom Air units under the ball of your foot respond to your force for court-ready cushioning.


Strength and Stability

A rigid heel counter with moulded lion graphic helps support the back of your foot and keeps you stable.


Stay In Control

An extra-durable rubber outsole with multi-directional traction helps you stay in control.


Product Details

  • Lightweight, breathable mesh
  • Resilient foam midsole
  • Colour Shown: Black/Fierce Purple/Metallic Gold
  • Style: CQ9381-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Jordan Jumpman 2021 PF.desc:
FOR THE PLAYER WHO'S GOT NEXT.


Inspired by the design of the latest Air Jordan game shoe, the Jordan Jumpman 2021 helps up-and-coming players level up their game. The shoe features responsive Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot. Curved Flightwire cables are stitched into the material for a close, secure fit for competitive play. This PF version is ideal for use on outdoor courts.


Responsive Up Front

A Zoom Air unit in the forefoot provides lightweight responsiveness to help drive you forwards.


Secure Support

Curved Flightwire cables are stitched into the upper along the side to help create a secure fit when you lace up.


Stable Side to Side

A moulded TPU piece set into the midsole provides side-to-side stability when you're moving in multiple directions.


More Benefits

  • Lightweight material through the toe and sides provides a close, comfortable fit.
  • Extra-durable rubber outsole with herringbone traction helps you grip the outdoor court.

Product Details

  • Foam midsole
  • Heel pull loop
  • Colour Shown: White/University Red/Black
  • Style: CQ4229-102
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Nike Fly.By Mid 2.desc:
ESSENTIAL PERFORMANCE TO LEVEL-UP YOUR GAME.


Step on the court with confidence in the Nike Fly.By Mid 2, a basketball shoe with nothing you don't need. From the multi-directional traction and responsive cushioning to the durable upper, it'll help keep you contained and in control on the court.


Cushioned Sole, Traction Control

A full-length foam midsole provides lightweight, flexible cushioning for your game. A durable rubber outsole with wavy traction lines helps you change directions on the fly.


Support with Agility

The cushioned mid-high collar provides a snug, supportive fit. It won't restrict ankle mobility, so you can stay agile and locked in.


Traditional Basketball Materials

The upper uses a combination of genuine leather and textile materials for durability. No-sew overlays provide extra reinforcement.


Product Details

  • Traditional tongue and lacing
  • Heel pull loop
  • Colour Shown: Black/Anthracite/White
  • Style: CU3503-004
  • Country/Region of Origin: India

Kyrie 7 By You.desc:
CREATE ON DEMAND.

Kyrie Irving is a creative force on and off the court—you can be too. He needs his shoes to keep up with his playmaking, but also sync with his boundary-pushing style and ethos. The Kyrie 7 By You is tuned for the next generation of energy return, control, speed and self-expression. Leave your mark while optimising the shoe's fit, court feel and banking ability.

Built to Perform

The 360-degree, computer-generated traction pattern helps you stay in control and move in and out of cuts. Choose from solid, XDR or glow-in-the-dark options for a wrapped outsole that gives you traction when changing directions

Designed to Perfection

Make the competition look twice with bold colours chosen for each shoe individually. You can make them match, but why would you when the choices are all yours?

Made to Shine

Add a metallic pop to the Swoosh design, heel graphic, fins or tongue logo for an eye-catching look. Choose your initial or a meaningful letter to add to the tongue in place of Kyrie's logo.

More Benefits

  • Mesh details wrap around your foot to create a close, comfortable fit that allows you to capitalise on your quickness.
  • The laces feed through moulded fins that pull down over your forefoot when you lace up.
  • The large forefoot Zoom Air unit is curved to bend in multiple directions. It provides energy return for fast and responsive cornering.
  • A padded collar provides support for your Achilles tendon.

Kyrie Low 4 EP.desc:
FAST, FOCUSED AND CONNECTED.


Kyrie needs shoes that won't slow him down and help him connect to the court. The Kyrie Low 4 EP is stripped of all excess to keep it lean and lightweight while fully containing the foot and helping to eliminate movement inside the shoe. Cushlon foam and Zoom Air provide a smooth, responsive ride, and the data-informed traction keeps Kyrie low to the ground and in control.


Forefoot Containment

The laces feed through 2-pronged "fingers" in the forefoot. When you tighten the laces, the fingers pull down to help lock your foot in over the footbed.


Smooth Ride, Focused Responsiveness

Full-length Cushlon foam is soft, responsive and smooth when moving from heel to toe. A Zoom Air unit adds responsiveness to help focus your attack.


Data-Informed Traction

The rubber outsole uses a data-informed, computer-generated traction pattern. It's designed to help grip the court in multiple directions. The rubber wraps up the toe and sides to help you stay in control when banking hard on your edges.


Lean Design

Stripped of all unnecessary components, the shoe's overall frame is built to be light and lean but supportive precisely where it's needed.


More Benefits

  • The sleek, sculpted midsole has a fast, streamlined look.
  • Padded, contoured collar is higher at the back to fit snugly around your Achilles tendon.
  • The rugged rubber outsole is designed for outdoor courts.
  • Colour Shown: Green Glow/Red Plum/Metallic Gold/Atomic Orange
  • Style: CZ0105-300
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Jordan Westbrook One Take PF.desc:
DEFIANT AND UNDENIABLY RUSS.


Inspired by the edgy designs of Russell Westbrook's "Why Not?" series, the Jordan Westbrook One Take PF combines extra-durable traction and forefoot responsiveness to help players stay in control on outdoor courts. The clash of colours and materials gives it a chaotic style, aligning with Russ' intense game and personality.


Control the Court

The rubber outsole is divided into 2 sections. A rigid piece in between each section provides structure and support. The herringbone traction is inspired by the AJ29—one of Russ' favourite shoes.


Responsive Forefoot Cushioning

The Zoom Air cushioning unit under the ball of the foot is springy and responsive to help drive you down the court.


Comfortable Fit

The shoe's partial bootie construction and double-layered collar provide a snug, secure fit around the ankle. This creates a contained, comfortable feel while you're moving quickly on the court.


Russ-Worthy Vibe

A clashing mix of materials with angular designs are inspired by Russell Westbrook's signature look.


More Benefits

  • External plastic heel counter helps your foot feel secure.
  • Thick, overt stitching provides durability and support.
  • Layered, 3D mesh tongue is breathable and spongy-soft.

Product Details

  • Textile material with synthetic overlays and overt stitch detail
  • Padded collar and tongue
  • Official Russell Westbrook logo
  • Extra-durable rubber outsole
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
  • Colour Shown: White/University Red/Black
  • Style: CJ0781-101
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Jordan Jumpman 2020 PF.desc:
LIGHTWEIGHT SUPPORT THAT RUNS THE COURT.


The Jordan Jumpman 2020 PF delivers lightweight support for dynamic play on the court. A textile upper and secure midfoot webbing keep you moving freely during possessions.


Looks and Feels Light

Springy foam midsole and Zoom Air provide lightweight cushioning. The cored-out design delivers a sleek, provocative look on the court.


Comfortable Design

Lightweight textile upper delivers breathability, while an indentation at the Achilles enhances comfort.


Stable Flight

Midfoot webbing helps secure your foot for play up and down the court.


More Benefits

  • Morse code translates to "23" around the toe and "1985" on the heel.
  • Extra-durable rubber outsole gives excellent traction.
  • Colour Shown: Racer Blue/White/Metallic Silver/Black
  • Style: BQ3448-401
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Nike Air Precision II.desc:
LIGHTWEIGHT RESPONSIVENESS


A shoe for all players and all positions, the Nike Precision II Basketball Shoe delivers basketball performance and off-court versatility. The mid top comfortably locks you in while providing a cushioned, responsive platform that's made to hustle.


Benefits

  • Textile and synthetic construction for comfortable containment
  • Forefoot mesh enhances breathability
  • Foam midsole with encapsulated Nike Air unit for lightweight cushioning
  • Padding around the ankle for cushioned support
  • Durable rubber tread delivers excellent traction
  • Colour Shown: Black/White
  • Style: AA7069-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Kyrie 7 EP 'Play for the Future'.desc:
CREATE ON DEMAND.


The greatest athletes leave a legacy, but it's not just accomplishment and accolades, points scored, titles won. More than ever it's about leaving the game better off than before, about leading it towards a more sustainable future for the generations who got next. The Kyrie 7 EP 'Play for the Future' is inspired by Kyrie's overall commitment to sustainable living, while nodding to his own plant-based diet. It features plant-inspired graphics throughout the upper, plus a sprouted "KI" logo on the heel.


Play Contained

Mesh details wrap around your foot to create a close, comfortable fit that allows you to capitalise on your quickness. The laces feed through moulded fins that pull down over your forefoot when you lace up.


Quick First Step

The large forefoot Zoom Air unit is curved and articulated to bend in multiple directions. It provides next-generation energy return for fast and responsive cornering, even on your edges.


Data-Informed Traction

The 360-degree, computer-generated traction pattern helps you stay in control and move quickly in and out of cuts. The rubber wraps up along the inner foot to give you traction when changing directions.


More Benefits

  • Padded collar feels supportive around your Achilles tendon.
  • Colour Shown: Atomic Orange/Tropical Twist/Black
  • Style: DD1446-800
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Kyrie's New Shoes

Kyrie Irving is a creative force on and off the court. He needs his shoes to keep up with his playmaking, but also sync with his boundary-pushing style and ethos. Tuned for the next generation of energy return, control and speed, the Kyrie 7 helps players at all levels take advantage of their quick first step by optimising the shoe's fit, court feel and banking ability.

LeBron Soldier 14 EP.desc:
LESS DISTRACTION FOR ULTIMATE CONTROL.


LeBron has always been crystal clear on his Soldier franchise: He wants to feel light, secure and in control. The LeBron Soldier 14 delivers, with a stripped-down, deconstructed design built to support a player with LeBron's force. A smooth, responsive cushioning system gives him a sensation that's distinct from his game shoe.


Smooth with Snap

Full-length foam and Zoom Air provide energy-return and responsiveness with a smooth heel-to-toe sensation. The thicker unit in the heel is placed beneath foam for extra padding and is visible through a window in the outsole. The forefoot unit is placed right up under your foot for a quick, continuous sensation.


Lightweight Containment

The sleek, futuristic design encloses your foot in a breathable partial bootie that's covered with a shroud. Woven materials complete the look.


Side-to-Side Stability

The plastic overlay along the outer side helps to stabilise your foot when quickly changing directions.


More Benefits

  • The plush inner bootie is perforated for breathability.
  • Tech-inspired micro graphics appear on the heel.
  • Tech specs are moulded into the outsole.

Product Details

  • Durably woven material in forefoot
  • Traditional tongue and laces
  • Gelled Swoosh design
  • Toggle on laces
  • Padded collar
  • Rubber toe tip
  • Heel pull tab
  • Colour Shown: White/Team Red/Midnight Navy/University Red
  • Style: CK6047-100
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Nike Renew Elevate 2.desc:
DESIGNED TO GO ALL GAME LONG.


Players who feel fresh play stronger down the stretch.The Nike Renew Elevate 2 is built to perform, providing responsive cushioning and plush comfort that extends through the entire shoe.A slight update to last year's model, the 2 features a repositioned Swoosh logo with zig-zag stitching and a newly added TPU component that the laces feed through to help reduce in-shoe movement.


Soft, Stable and Responsive

The midsole is made using 2 different foams that are fused together.The Nike Renew foam targets the areas where your foot needs soft, responsive cushioning.The firmer, supportive foam provides structure and stability where it's needed.


Lightweight Feel

Structured mesh in the upper feels plush around your foot.It fits snugly to help reduce in-shoe movement during play.


Stop and Go with Confidence

The rubber outsole uses a wavy, geometric tread pattern for multi-directional traction and control.The rubber extends higher in the toe and at the sides for added traction and durability.


Ankle Support

The padded collar is contoured to provide a precise fit and support around your ankle.


Product Details

  • TPU Swoosh design with zigzag stitching
  • Textured TPU eyestay
  • Plush tongue
  • No-sew overlays
  • Colour Shown: White/Volt/Indigo Burst/Black
  • Style: CW3406-101
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Air Jordan XXXV.desc:
THE FASTEST, MOST RESPONSIVE GAME SHOE YET.


The lighter the shoe, the less weight to carry, the faster players can go. Evolving from last year's release, the Air Jordan XXXV features a stabilising Eclipse plate 2.0, visible Zoom Air cushioning and stitched-in Flightwire cables that help lock you in when you lace up. Lightweight and responsive, it's designed to help players get the most from their power and athleticism.


Sculpted Support

The smoothly sculpted Eclipse plate is raised slightly to enhance side-to-side stability and support. It's hollowed out to reduce the shoe's overall weight and reveal the edges of the Zoom Air cushioning.


Visible Zoom

Zoom Air cushioning under the heel and forefoot has a springy, responsive feel that recharges with every step. The thick, large-volume heel unit provides impact cushioning, while the large forefoot unit helps drive you down the court. The edges of both units are visible through the hollow midsole plate.


Lock In with Flightwire

Flightwire cables stitched into the side radiate up from the curved plate, helping to lock you down over the footbed when you lace up.


Traction and Control Outdoors

The rubber outsole uses a modified herringbone tread pattern that grips the court to help you stop, start and change directions in a flash.


More Benefits

  • The bump-out collar, tongue shape and rubberised print on the tongue nod to the design of the Air Jordan 5.

Product Details

  • Foam sole
  • Tongue pull tab
  • Iridescent details
  • Colour Shown: Blue Fury/Electric Green/University Red/Metallic Silver
  • Style: DD3667-400
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Evolution from 34 to 35

The Air Jordan XXXV maintains the overall aesthetic of the 34, with the return of the Eclipse plate, visible Zoom and an ultralight upper made from partially translucent materials. The design balances cutting-edge innovations with OG details that nod to the history and heritage of the brand.

Air Jordan XXXV Low PF.desc:
ZERO TO ZOOM.


Basketball players create separation by cutting quicker, running faster and jumping higher than the competition. The ultra-lightweight Air Jordan XXXV Low helps transform your speed and power into linear and vertical separation. Similar to the inline game shoe, it uses a sculpted and stable midsole that's loaded with visible, large-volume Zoom Air units to help you exploit the space you create. The lower collar height allows ankle mobility while keeping you fully and comfortably contained. This PF version uses an extra-durable outsole that's ideal for outdoor courts.


Eclipse the Competition

The sculpted Eclipse plate 2.0 is raised along its upper edge to enhance side-to-side stability and support. It's hollowed out to reduce the shoe's overall weight while letting you see through the shoe.


2x Visible Zoom

Zoom Air cushioning under the heel and forefoot has a springy, responsive feel. The large-volume heel unit provides impact cushioning, while the forefoot unit helps support your game. The edges of both units are visible through the hollow midsole plate.


Lace Up, Lock In

Flightwire cables stitched into the side radiate up from the curved plate. When you lace up they pull the material snugly over the sides and top of your foot to help keep you stable on the footbed.


Traction and Control

The rubber outsole uses a modified herringbone tread pattern that grips the court. It's designed to help you stop, start and change directions on the fly.


More Benefits

  • The extra-durable outsole rubber is designed to play on outdoor courts.

Product Details

  • Foam sole
  • Tongue pull tab
  • Heel tab
  • Iridescent details
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
  • Colour Shown: White/Black/Metallic Silver
  • Style: CW2459-100
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Evolution of the Low

The Air Jordan XXXV Low maintains the overall aesthetic of the 34, with an updated Eclipse plate that rises higher into the upper. The edges of both Zoom Air units are now visible. The design balances cutting-edge innovations with OG details that nod to the history and heritage of the brand.

LeBron Witness 4 EP.desc:
LIGHT, STRONG AND RESPONSIVE FOR OUTDOOR BALL.


Be a force on the court in the LeBron Witness 4: a great fit for powerful players who want good ankle support from a shoe that still feels light. Durably built for playing on outdoor courts, its sculpted, padded collar and exterior heel counter provide a stable fit, while visible cushioning units under the forefoot return energy with every step.


Responsive Feel

Zoom Air units under the forefoot compress under your weight then spring back, providing a responsive, propulsive feel. The cushioning is visible from the sides, giving you insight into the technology.


Stability and Support

High, shaped collar helps contain your ankle, while the rigid external heel counter helps keep you stable over the footbed.


Durable Outsole, Flexible Traction

The extra-durable outsole rubber is designed to be flexible. A shockwave-inspired traction pattern helps create quick cuts and transitions during possession.


More Benefits

  • Partial bootie with tongue construction for a supportive fit.
  • Resilient foam midsole for cushioning.
  • Padded collar for comfort.

Product Details

  • Moulded lion detail on the heel
  • Dual pull tabs
  • Colour Shown: Black/Hyper Cobalt/Clear
  • Style: CD0188-007
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam
